titleNullable: Extracted regions of interest from COCO val2017
subtitleNullable: Can be used for one-to-rest SVM classification after HOG feature extraction
descriptionNullable:
Extract the file , go to data -> Data . You will find directories with names 'bear' , 'bicycle' , 'bus' ,  'car' ,  'cat',  'cow' ,  'dog' ,  'elephant' , 'fire_hydrant' , 'motorcycle' ,  'person' ,'sheep' , 'stop_sign' , 'traffic_light' , 'train'  ,'truck'. Each directory contains positive sample images for the said class (directory name) . The images have been extracted from COCO 2017 Validation images using the ground truth annotations . 
The datasets can be used for One-to-Rest Support Vector Machine classification after applying HOG feature extraction on each image . The data can also be used to train region suggestion algorithms for object detection .
Each image is named in following format - 
(name of the image from COCO val2017 from where extracted)_(x)_(y)_(w)_(h).jpg , where x,y,w,h are annotations (Xmin, Ymin , width , height)
